Description.Name: Advanced Command Module
Description.Details: The Advanced Command Module Mark II is a further improvement of the original Module from the Cyclops line of 'Mechs. By utilizing the increased space and internals available on a superheavy 'Mech the functionality is further improved and optimized.

Description.Name: AreaSensors Sensor Information1
Description.Details: Shares Sensor Information on nearby Targets

Description.Details: Shares Sensor Information on nearby Targets

Description.Name: AreaSensors Sensor Information3
Description.Details: Shares Sensor Information on nearby Targets

Description.Name: C3i network
Description.Details: Shows their vision when lancemates move

Description.Details: Shows their vision when lancemates move

Description.Name: C3 AI
Description.Details: Shows their vision when lancemates move

Description.Name: SPY SAT PING
Description.Details: Activated ability (uses Firing action). Performs a Sensor Lock against all enemies within its radius, as indicated by the spinning gold ring. Will go into cooldown state after use.

Description.Name: MORALE GENERATION INCREASED
Description.Details: Provides a bonus to actions that generate Morale.

Description.Name: Vision Sharing
Description.Details: Shows their vision when lancemates move
